fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Regional Policy, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Waste framework directive, producer responsibility obligations, waste regulation, industrial and commercial waste management, energy efficiency, circular economy, European Regional Development Funding.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: EU Platform on Food Losses and Food Waste#E03421#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3421#Member#C#Sub-group to support EU activites on measurements of food waste
goals__remit: Zero Waste Scotland is funded by the Scottish Government to support the delivery of Making things last it circular economy strategy and other low carbon and resource efficiency policy priorities. Zero Waste Scotland is a lead organisation for the delivery of the Scottish Government's European Regional Development Funding for the circular economy and resource efficiency in Scotland.
